name: Old Man VS The Internet
description:
Survive for 2 minutes against the onslaught of outdated and unrelated memes!

Left Mouse Click to attack

WASD to move

Old Man will rotate to attack in the direction he is facing

*Volume adjusting of the game highly recommended!*

Game Programming and Art by Charlie

Music by Sam

Emotional Support by Kat

(Updated 1.1 version so you can press ‘ESC’ to quit out in game, increased audio volume significantly!)
